{"id":491675889,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 1 month","timestamp":1620722928,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"12 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/491675889/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Delete Operation for Two Strings","memory":"7.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minDistance(string s1, string s2) {\n        int m=s1.size();\n        int n=s2.size();\n        int dp[m+1][n+1];\n        for(int i=0;i<=m;i++){\n            for(int j=0;j<=n;j++){\n                dp[i][j]=0;\n            }\n        }\n        for(int i=1;i<=m;i++){\n            for(int j=1;j<=n;j++){\n                if(s1[i-1]==s2[j-1]){\n                    dp[i][j]=dp[i-1][j-1]+1;\n                }\n                else{\n                    dp[i][j]=max(dp[i-1][j],dp[i][j-1]);\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return (m-dp[m][n])+(n-dp[m][n]);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"delete-operation-for-two-strings"}
